code: import{SET_ALERT,REMOVE_ALERT}from'../actions/types';const initialState=[];export default function alertReducer(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;const{type,payload}=action;switch(type){case SET_ALERT:{return[...state,payload];}case REMOVE_ALERT:{return state.filter(alert=>alert.id!==payload);}default:{return state;}}}
